result.title: Magic countries of Codeforces
result.content:
Hi guys

I've just thought about how many imaginary places were used in codeforces' problems statements. Probably there's a lot of them. What kinda that places do you know and what do you know about them?

In example:

Uzhlyandia is a country based on Uzhhorod city. Uzhlyandia was mentioned in CF rounds #407 and in three problems on CodeChef (1, 2, 3). Also it has its own game called "Uzhlyandian Wars" developed by some cool guys.
